name: Olo
description:
A bare-bone version of the project I was planning to make until life got in the way - created in around 10 hours. Simple hack'n'slash combat with lots of carrots to munch on.

Standard 'A' and 'D' to move left and right, space to jump.

Inventory can be scrolled with the mouse or numkeys.

Left-click will activate whatever item is currently selected.
